name: Genie-us Friends
description:
A co-op multiplayer arena game. You play as Master and Djinn against the other team.  The master control the movement and collecting and the djinn uses his magic powers to transform the enviroment into points.

You need 4 controller to play the game.

Have fun.

Objective: Collect the most gold.

Master controls:

Movement - Left Stick

Jump: A(Xbox)/X (Play Station)

Djinn controls:

Rotate around:  Right Stick

Shoot: Rigth Trigger

Switch to Food Spell: B(Xbox)/ Cirkel(Play Station)

Switch to Gold Spell: Y(Xbox) / Triangle(Play Station)

Switch to Attack Spell: X  / Square (Play Station)
